title: How to unsubscribe from Factor
description: Factor is a meal delivery service that offers a variety of prepared meals. You can cancel your Factor subscription at any time through their website or iOS app. Make sure to cancel at least five days before your next scheduled delivery to avoid being charged.

steps_1.title: Cancel Your Factor Subscription via Website
steps_1.description:
To cancel your Factor subscription through their website, follow these steps:

*   Go to the Factor Meals website.
*   Log in to your account.
*   Navigate to 'Plan Settings' or 'Account Settings'.
*   Click on 'Cancel plan' or 'Deactivate My Plan'.
*   Follow the cancellation instructions provided.
*   Check your email for a cancellation confirmation.

seo_text: Learn how to easily cancel your Factor meal delivery subscription. Follow our step-by-step guide to cancel your Factor plan and avoid unwanted charges. This guide provides instructions for canceling via the Factor website and iOS app.
